personal.name: Alex Chen
personal.title: Senior Product Manager
personal.tagline: Building products that users love and businesses need
personal.bio: Experienced Product Manager with 6+ years building consumer and B2B products at scale. Led teams that shipped features used by millions of users, with a track record of driving 40%+ growth in key metrics through data-driven product decisions.

caseStudies.title: Mobile Checkout Redesign
caseStudies.subtitle: Increasing conversion rates by 32% through UX optimization
caseStudies.description: Led the complete redesign of our mobile checkout flow, resulting in a 32% increase in conversion rates and $2.4M additional annual revenue.

caseStudies.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
caseStudies.subtitle: Boosting engagement with personalized content discovery
caseStudies.description: Developed and launched an ML-powered recommendation system that increased user engagement by 45% and session time by 28%.

caseStudies.title: Enterprise Analytics Dashboard
caseStudies.subtitle: Empowering data-driven decisions for enterprise customers
caseStudies.description: Built a comprehensive analytics dashboard for enterprise clients, leading to 40% faster decision-making and 90% customer satisfaction.

makerProjects.title: HabitFlow
makerProjects.subtitle: A minimalist habit tracking app
makerProjects.description: Built a habit tracking app with 10k+ downloads that helps users build better habits through gamification and smart reminders.

makerProjects.title: PM Toolkit
makerProjects.subtitle: Essential tools and templates for product managers
makerProjects.description: Created a comprehensive toolkit with 50+ templates, frameworks, and resources used by 2000+ product managers worldwide.

writing.title: The Art of Product Discovery
writing.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to validating product ideas before you build them. Learn frameworks and techniques used by top product teams.

writing.title: Making Data-Driven Product Decisions
writing.excerpt: How to use data effectively in product management without falling into common traps. Includes real examples and actionable frameworks.

writing.title: Mastering Stakeholder Management as a PM
writing.excerpt: Practical strategies for managing up, down, and across in complex organizations. Learn to align stakeholders and drive consensus.

resources.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD) Template
resources.description: A comprehensive PRD template used by top tech companies, including sections for problem definition, user stories, and success metrics.

resources.title: Feature Prioritization Framework
resources.description: A strategic framework for prioritizing features based on impact, effort, and strategic alignment. Includes scoring methodology.

resources.title: User Research Planning Kit
resources.description: Everything you need to plan and execute user research, including interview guides, survey templates, and analysis frameworks.
